>
[Undertaker's Manifest](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2185)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Darkness" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=39" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 220 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This grim collection of spreadsheets is used both by undertakers who occasionally need to avoid the notice of their more restless clients, and by industrious necromancers looking to avoid catching the notice of cemetery guards and vigilant undertakers.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** If your next action is to cast a [shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=693) or [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510) spell, the spell’s casting is accompanied by a roiling cloud of shadow that spills out around you, creating [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2403) in a 30-foot [emanation](/Rules.aspx?ID=2387) centered on you for the next 3 rounds. This has no effect on areas where the lighting level is already darker than dim light.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
